programme.title: Tequila Joe
programme.desc: A young deputy tries to sober and revitalize a washed up, alcoholic sheriff to take down a pair of warring gangs of criminals in the Old West.

programme.title: Three Lead Dollars
programme.desc: Rudy returns home to revenge his father's death, fighting local bandits.

programme.title: His Name Was Sam Walbash, But They Call Him Amen
programme.desc: A cruel and ruthless bandit kills a tavern owner who had ratted him out to the authorities.

programme.title: Doc, Hands of Steel
programme.desc: Doc McGregor, former surgeon become player, is wrongly accused of murder and pursued by Slade, a bounty hunter.

programme.title: Bastard, Go and Kill
programme.desc: Chaco, a Mexican on the run from just about everyone, is framed for the killing of a couple of cattlemen.

programme.title: Gunman of One Hundred Crosses
programme.desc: An Irishman is killed in the wild West. His son Jimmy goes out searching for the killers of his father, but is soon ambushed by two highwaymen, and killed, too.

programme.title: God is my Colt
programme.desc: A Army agent goes undercover to clean up corrupt Langford City full of Mexican outlaws.

programme.title: Seven Guns for the MacGregors
programme.desc: Ranch owner MacGregor has seven sons and oldest Gregor leads his brothers to Las Mesas, a small town where they want to sell horses. They get into trouble with local people who are related with evil Santillana. After getting imprisoned and losing their horses they decide to go after Santillana's gang.

programme.title: A Town Called Hell
programme.desc: A group of Mexican revolutionaries murders a town priest and a number of his christian followers. Ten years later, a widow arrives in town intent to take revenge from her husband's killers.

programme.title: Ultimate Gunfighter
programme.desc: Two family clans have always been enemies; they spend their time hating and killing each other. The daughter of the Campos family and the son of the Mounter family fall in love, thus causing further hatred and deaths.

programme.title: Dig Your Grave Friend... Sabata's Coming
programme.desc: Steve McGowan returns from war to avenge his father’s murder by a ruthless landowner. Imprisoned, he escapes with a bandit and steals a stagecoach—only to find the villain’s fiancée inside. As hired guns close in, alliances shift, and the fight for justice takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Black Killer
programme.desc: In Tombstone, a new sheriff vows to clean up the town of outlaws like the O'Hara brothers and is assisted by a strange lawyer who always carries two large law books with him.

programme.title: The Counterfeit Kid
programme.desc: Jack, a farmhand, accidentally impersonates the notorious outlaw "Bloody" Ben Harris. Now, on a treasure hunt, he must rely on a group of wild misfits to outsmart the outlaw he's pretending to be. With Harris hot on his trail, Jack must find the treasure and return to his true love, Olivia, before it’s too late.

programme.title: Six Bounty Killers for a Massacre
programme.desc: The Governor of Kansas hires six gunfighters to overthrow the tyrannical rule of the self-appointed sheriff of Abilene who is holding several hostages including his family.

programme.title: And the Crows Will Dig Your Grave
programme.desc: After the Civil War, Wells Fargo hires gunmen to protect against increasing bandit attacks. Jeff Sullivan, driven by revenge for his murdered wife, joins the team to hunt down Glenn Kovacks and his gang. Alongside bounty hunter Pancho Corrales, Sullivan faces treachery, culminating in a deadly showdown where only he survives to save a prisoner.
